name: gh-action-auto-bumper
description: If all changes for a pull request are contained within a specified directory match, automatically increment the associated versions and immediately push the change to the pull request

scripts.updateTag: git tag -d v1.0 && git push --delete origin v1.0 && git tag -a -m 'Make a 1.0' v1.0 && git push --follow-tags
scripts.updateTestTag: git tag -d v0.1 && git push --delete origin v0.1 && git tag -a -m 'Test Tag' v0.1 && git push --follow-tags
